$$

Let’s define $ S_2 $ as the sum of this series:

$$
S_2 = \sum_{n=0}^{\infty} \frac{2n+1}{2^{2n+1}}
$$

$$
S_2 = \frac{1}{2} \sum_{n=0}^{\infty} \frac{2n+1}{4^n}
$$

$$
S_2 = \frac{1}{2} \left( \sum_{n=0}^{\infty} \frac{2n}{4^n} + \sum_{n=0}^{\infty} \frac{1}{4^n} \right)
$$
